text: Bo'ai Special Zone area in Zhongzheng District of Taipei City The Bo'ai Special Zone () is a buffer zone in Zhongzheng District, Taipei, Taiwan which houses several critical government office buildings.http://www.chinapost.com.tw/taiwan/national/national- news/2014/11/10/421474/MND-is.htm ==List of buildings== * Presidential Office Building * Presidential Official Residence * Executive Yuan * Judicial Yuan * Ministry of Foreign Affairs * Ministry of National Defensehttp://www.taipeitimes.com/News/front/archives/2009/09/30/2003454835 * Taipei Futai Street Mansion * Taipei Guest House ==Restrictions== Buildings built within this area have to comply with the 24-meter height limit. ==See also== * Exclusion zone ==References== Category:Geography of Taipei
title: Bo'ai Special Zone
